metadata.name: Mock
metadata.description: Annotates a field for which a Mock Object will be prepared and injected

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of Mock Object to inject, either 'nice' or 'strict' or 'partial'

attribute.name: inject
attribute.description: Indicates if a Mock instance should be injected to the field

attribute.name: args
attribute.description: Name of the getter or method to call for constructor arguments for the Mock Object
